description: Decadent, delicious, and piled high with coconut whipped cream! Oh, and this vegan strawberry shortcake has a twist: the strawberries are soaked in a zippy maple ginger marinade.
name: Maple Ginger Vegan Strawberry Shortcake
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon freshly grated ginger, (or more or less to taste (optional)
1 cup whole wheat pastry flour (can sub spelt or another cup of all purpose)
2/3 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
1/4 cup canola oil, (or any neutral flavored baking oil)
2 (14 ounce) cans coconut cream or coconut milk, (refrigerated at least 12 hours (ideally 24-48 hours)
1/4 cup maple syrup, (or to taste (can sub agave)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir all ingredients together in medium bowl and allow the mixture to sit at room temperature while you prepare the rest of the dish.
